attributes.action: Make it a Criminal Offence, not to have a Licens, to do Building work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the Govt, to introduce  a Nationwide Licencing Scheme, for, all Trades working in the Building Industry.

If every Tradesman had an I.D. Which showed that he was a Tradesman, and Govt Licenced, to carry out the work he was   Tendering or Quoting for.

Then the  Cowboys, and Fraudsters would be quickley weeded out, and the Elderly would not be Preyed on.

The decent Tradesmen will Support this measure, just to clearout these Criminals.
